get.description: GetListings responds with the list of all listings as JSON.

post.description: CreateListing adds a listing from JSON received in the request body.

get.description: GetListing locates the listing whose ID value matches the id parameter sent by the client, then returns that listing as a response.

put.description: UpdateListing updates the listing whose ID value matches the id parameter sent by the client.

delete.description: DeleteListing locates the listing whose ID value matches the id parameter sent by the client, then deletes it.

active.description:
Whether the listing is active
example: true

category.description:
The category of the listing
required: true
example: Property

date_posted.description:
The date the listing was posted
required: true
example: 2025-01-01T00:00:00Z

description.description:
The description of the listing
required: true
example: This is my first listing

id.description:
The ID of the listing

example: 1

price.description:
The price of the listing
required: true
example: 100.00

title.description:
The title of the listing
required: true
example: Red House
